name: toothbook
description:
**ToothBook** is the portfolio project for the 12-month ALX SE program.
It is a website service for manageing communication between dentists and patients during the diagnostic process and curing journey.

scripts.build: concurrently "cd front-end && npm i " "cd back-end && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd front-end && npm run dev" "cd back-end && npm run dev"
